title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 22.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 22.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to implement the provisions of
article XI-B of the State Finance Law as added by chapter 166 of the Laws of
1991 and as amended by chapter 648 of the Laws of 1992 and chapter 292 of the

Laws of 2007. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
22.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
